New Records: Paul Stirling recorded his highest score of the season in Abu Dhabi
Key Match Events: South Africa’s top order struggled and were quickly 10-3
Mark Adair took two wickets in a probing opening spell
Craig Young and Graham Hume claimed three each
Pre-Game Insights: The question was asked: Would it have made a difference if Ireland had batted first?
Post-Match Reflections: After Friday’s second thumping defeat, the answer provided yesterday was an emphatic ‘Yes’.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ireland are likely to play another ‘home series’ in Abu Dhabi for commercial reasons
